bcbioSingleCell
  • Reference
  • News

Define Cell to Sample Mappings

This function extracts sampleID from the cellID column using grep matching.

mapCellsToSamples(cells, samples)

Arguments

cells

Cell identifiers.
samples

Sample identifiers.

Value

Named factor containing cell IDs as the names, and samples as the factor levels.

Examples

load(system.file("extdata/bcb.rda", package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

cells <- colnames(bcb)
samples <- sampleMetadata(bcb)[["sampleID"]]

map <- mapCellsToSamples(cells, samples)
head(map)
#> run1_AGAGGATA_AAACACTA_CTTAGGTA run1_AGAGGATA_AAACACTA_CTTCGATT 
#>                   run1_AGAGGATA                   run1_AGAGGATA 
#> run1_AGAGGATA_AAACCGCC_GAGTTTCG run1_AGAGGATA_AAACCGCC_TAGCCTCG 
#>                   run1_AGAGGATA                   run1_AGAGGATA 
#> run1_AGAGGATA_AAACGATC_TTTACCCT run1_AGAGGATA_AAACTACA_CCACATTA 
#>                   run1_AGAGGATA                   run1_AGAGGATA 
#> Levels: run1_AGAGGATA run2_AGAGGATA
levels(map)
#> [1] "run1_AGAGGATA" "run2_AGAGGATA"
